special_text:
Mountains you control have “{T}: Add {R}{R}.”
[+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
[-2]: Conjure six cards named Scorch. Shuffle them and your hand into your library, then draw two cards. [i](Scorch is a red sorcery that costs {R} with “Scorch deals 3 damage to any target.”)[/i]
